entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
